auth.welcome_back_description: To log in, please enter your email or phone number.

otp.verify_email_description: A text message has been sent to {{email}}. Please check your Spam folder if you don't find the code in your primary email.

validation.unexpected_error: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
validation.field_must_be_valid_en_number: Use numbers in the correct format (1, 2, 3).
